biography: Manoj Kumar Sharma is an Indian Police Service (IPS) officer currently serving as the Inspector General of Police of the Maharashtra Police. His journey from poverty to becoming an IPS officer was chronicled in Anurag Pathak's book Twelfth Fail, which was later adapted into the film 12th Fail (2023).
aiSummary: Manoj Sharma is a health behavior science specialist with an H-index of 110 at Public Health (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet. Gastroenterology & hepatology, Molecular and Cellular Biology, Nature Cell Biology. Based in India.
